channel.title: Freedom vs. Religion
channel.description:
Before you start to think this is going to be a biased topic its not.
I have always wondered what people think about certain things so here goes.
Would you guys rather be American because of your "freedoms", or in other country because of their religious culture?
Say the country for the religious culture and why..
Myself personally I would say I rather be in a European country, they are limited on freedom's but the justice is better than America's.. I am American just the fact of having to climb a chain to get something done is horrid. I hate having to see people go to court in circuit courts, then moved up over time to the supreme court its a waste of time when one level of government could settle it, such as a monarchy.

item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Explisionist:

Myself personally I would say I rather be in a European country, they are limited on freedom’s but the justice is better than America’s…

limited in freedom in what way?

I’d much rather remain a british citizen and have the freedom to board a plane without being groped or subject to a naked body scanner

item.title: Freedom vs. Religion
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:66, topic:423521”][quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=526153.msg3832220#msg3832220 date=1322673842]
I’m happy, I’m Armenian and Armenians are the first Christians in the world so we are not short on culture (we have data that goes 3500 years back in history). Yet I live in Europe which gives me all the opportunities I need.

The “justice” system of Belgium, on the other hand, is nothing to be proud of.
[/quote]Procedural mistakes you mean ;)[/quote]I guess you could put it that way.

item.title: Freedom vs. Religion
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:62, topic:423521”][quote author=chillwitm888 link=topic=526153.msg3838163#msg3838163 date=1323029499]

In the U.S you have no freedom, the government basically owns you.

Politicians are there to make you think you have freedom of choice.

How the hell does the government take away my freedom? I am free to exercise my rights as long as they do not infract on other’s rights.

Here, let me fix it for you.

In U.S Russia or China you have no freedom, the government owns you.

No. China Just doesn’t allow P-0rn I find that reasonable
In china they have their own facebook and youtube…
whats the difference if your 100% born in china and Lived?
theres more freedom there actually, big area space and fight and train
as much as you want
Source:
To be honest… I am chinese.
[/quote]

I guess only being allowed to have 1 child is what you would consider more freedom than in America. The doctors in China kill the female babies by pressing their thumb into the soft spot of the babies head, that’s horrible.[/quote]
Well Yeah… Your only allowed 1…in china because it is the most populated country in this WORLD.
But if you give money (to govt.) they allow you to have 2 children, you can give 1 to adopt.
the money is pricy but if you want your second children, you do it.

Read full topic

item.title: Freedom vs. Religion
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:55, topic:423521”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=526153.msg3836474#msg3836474 date=1322944806]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=526153.msg3836019#msg3836019 date=1322918838]

Depends, that’s when you ask is American truly free, and start questioning everything
[/quote]And then ask why you think European justice is better o.o I didn’t think they believed in justice.

Because in Europe there are laws that everyone follows and they are not biased based on race, or social statue…
American’s are laid back on certain types of Americans.

You’re forgetting that the US is a melting pot. The reason we have so much race crime is because we have the largest variety of minorities.
[/quote]+1 for European gangs in the USA!

Yeah damn those Spangelli, sellin there drugs and talkin in another language like ,THEY KNOW THEY IN THE USA! WE LIVE IN AMERICA, WE SPEAK AMERICAN DAMMIT. THATS WHAT THE BIBLE IS WRITTEN IN AND THAT’S THE WAY THE GOOD LORD INTENDED IT TO BE!

There’s no such thing as speaking American. /English.[/quote]

Really…? That was the ONLY mistake you gathered from that retarded rant I did? Come on now. The bible was written in Hebrew. There is no such thing as “Spangelli”. The whole idea behind that post was to make a joke. I guess it was wasted on humorless ears.

Read full topic
